Be a wolf in a forest full of cruel hunters and rescue your stolen cub
Sneak your way through the gloomy woods or rip your opponents apart. No

1. Unrar

4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to

5. Play the game
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
